title: Modern FPS Music Collection
description: A collection of modern, dynamic action music tracks. Perfect choice for any FPS/TPS action game.
longDescription:
This music pack contains 129 professionally composed, produced and mixed audio files made from 10 dynamic, adrenaline pumping tracks. These tracks will match perfectly with any modern action video game.


SOUNDCLOUD DEMO

YOUTUBE DEMO


Ready to go:

Full tracks and loops included.


Safe to use:

All of my music is royalty free and streaming friendly. You can be sure that streamers will not get copyright claim from YouTube, Twitch, etc. while streaming your game with my music.
